description: My friends say I'm calm, stylish, flexible, romantic, sensitive, conservative, caring, fun-loving, trustworthy and intelligent.I am a person who always smiles and enjoys life. I think that laugh makes our life longer. Life is beautiful. I like meeting new people. I don't like fights, we can always talk and find solution.I am a person with a lot of experience and a full package of interesting stories. I want to find my soulmate, friend and partner. I don't ask too much I think, I don't think about age or looks, the most important for me is a soul of a woman.! and a woman who is trustworthy and loyal and wants a real love,
